name: Bizz Bar
body:
Show your visitor what's new today with Bizz Bar, or promote your popular products, announcement. One sticky thing for all purpose. Try it now

### Easy to use 
Include the js and css files and embed the HTML code. 

### Custom Look
You can change the font size, font family, background, or anything. Make a perfect combination. 

### Fast & Small
Incredible small file size, **1,73 KB** (Compressed) and **265 Bytes** JavaScript. 

### Free 
It's free

### Browser Compatibllity
Tested in recent version of Firefox and Chrome.

Project By [Bizz Drean](http://bizz-drean.blogspot.com) and [David Hosanna Chianardi](http://www.facebook.com/bizz.drean)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
